typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> traffic
traffic sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		timeperiod,
		flow1,
		occupancy1,
		speed1,
		flow2,
		occupancy2,
		speed2,
		flow3,
		occupancy3,
		speed3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserDataSink
